mapper.select:
select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.proc_id , t1.applicant_id , t1.applicant_depart , t1.unified_id , t1.form_state , t1.device_name , t1.device_category , t1.device_spec , t1.device_model , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_dept , t1.contact , t1.position , t1.manufacturer , t1.is_pc , t1.is_test_device , t1.is_metering , t1.repair_dept , t1.failure_desc , t1.repair_desc , t1.repair_finish_time , t1.finish_ack , t1.repair_quality , t1.failure_analysis_id , t1.failure_analysis_desc , t1.service_attitude , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.repair_progress , t1.repair_plan_staff , t1.repair_staff , t1.meter_plan_staff , t1.has_extra_expense , t1.extra_expense_explain from assets_device_repair t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.PROC_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.procId}),'%')
and t1.APPLICANT_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.applicantId}),'%')
and t1.APPLICANT_DEPART like concat(concat('%',#{bean.applicantDepart}),'%')
and t1.UNIFIED_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unifiedId}),'%')
and t1.FORM_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.formState}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceName}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_CATEGORY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceCategory}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_SPEC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceSpec}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_MODEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceModel}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerId}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerDept}),'%')
and t1.CONTACT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.contact}),'%')
and t1.POSITION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.position}),'%')
and t1.MANUFACTURER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.manufacturer}),'%')
and t1.IS_PC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isPc}),'%')
and t1.IS_TEST_DEVICE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isTestDevice}),'%')
and t1.IS_METERING like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isMetering}),'%')
and t1.REPAIR_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.repairDept}),'%')
and t1.FAILURE_DESC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.failureDesc}),'%')
and t1.REPAIR_DESC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.repairDesc}),'%')
and t1.REPAIR_FINISH_TIME >= #{bean.repairFinishTimeBegin}
and t1.REPAIR_FINISH_TIME <= #{bean.repairFinishTimeEnd}
and t1.FINISH_ACK like concat(concat('%',#{bean.finishAck}),'%')
and t1.REPAIR_QUALITY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.repairQuality}),'%')
and t1.FAILURE_ANALYSIS_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.failureAnalysisId}),'%')
and t1.FAILURE_ANALYSIS_DESC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.failureAnalysisDesc}),'%')
and t1.SERVICE_ATTITUDE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.serviceAttitude}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute03}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute04}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute05}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute06}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute07}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute08}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute09}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute10}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute11}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute12}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_16 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute16}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_17 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute17}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_18 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute18}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_19 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute19}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
and t1.REPAIR_PROGRESS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.repairProgress}),'%')
and t1.REPAIR_PLAN_STAFF like concat(concat('%',#{bean.repairPlanStaff}),'%')
and t1.REPAIR_STAFF like concat(concat('%',#{bean.repairStaff}),'%')
and t1.METER_PLAN_STAFF like concat(concat('%',#{bean.meterPlanStaff}),'%')
and t1.HAS_EXTRA_EXPENSE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.hasExtraExpense}),'%')
and t1.EXTRA_EXPENSE_EXPLAIN like concat(concat('%',#{bean.extraExpenseExplain}),'%')
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.proc_id , t1.applicant_id , t1.applicant_depart , t1.unified_id , t1.form_state , t1.device_name , t1.device_category , t1.device_spec , t1.device_model , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_dept , t1.contact , t1.position , t1.manufacturer , t1.is_pc , t1.is_test_device , t1.is_metering , t1.repair_dept , t1.failure_desc , t1.repair_desc , t1.repair_finish_time , t1.finish_ack , t1.repair_quality , t1.failure_analysis_id , t1.failure_analysis_desc , t1.service_attitude , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.repair_progress , t1.repair_plan_staff , t1.repair_staff , t1.meter_plan_staff , t1.has_extra_expense , t1.extra_expense_explain from assets_device_repair t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_

select t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.proc_id , t1.applicant_id , t1.applicant_depart , t1.unified_id , t1.form_state , t1.device_name , t1.device_category , t1.device_spec , t1.device_model , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_dept , t1.contact , t1.position , t1.manufacturer , t1.is_pc , t1.is_test_device , t1.is_metering , t1.repair_dept , t1.failure_desc , t1.repair_desc , t1.repair_finish_time , t1.finish_ack , t1.repair_quality , t1.failure_analysis_id , t1.failure_analysis_desc , t1.service_attitude , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.repair_progress , t1.repair_plan_staff , t1.repair_staff , t1.meter_plan_staff , t1.has_extra_expense , t1.extra_expense_explain from assets_device_repair t1 where t1.id = #{id}
